Title: Relates to establishing a renewable electricity compliance program and renewable energy procurements
Summary: Establishes a renewable electricity compliance program and renewable energy procurements requiring seventy percent qualified renewable energy systems in use by 2032.
LawCode: Add ยง66-q, Pub Serv L; add ยง1884, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the public authorities law, in relation to establishing a renewable electricity compliance program and renewable energy procurements
